website_summaries.verdict: A solid set overall, with nice weight and balance to the knives, although some felt that it should have included a serrated option.
pros: 12-piece set includes 11 knives in all (6 steak knives), as well as a storage block
Slots in the block work well to sharpen knives
Nice balance and weight to the knives
cons: Set does not contain a serrated knife like most sets
Some buyers say the slots go dull and stop sharpening knives

customer_reviews.title: Rusty knifes are not good.
customer_reviews.text: I use this knife set for everything. Well use to until I started seeing rust spots here and there. After five months is when I noticed one of the tips had rush on it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but they were kind of dull on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but they were kind of dull on arrival. Just be sure to sharpen them up and always clean and dry them immediately after use.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Siggers

customer_reviews.title: I quickly found out that this was a great purchase. I will defiantly recommend this product to ...
customer_reviews.text: The knife set came in the time I expected. I was kind of skeptical about buying knifes on the internet. I quickly found out that this was a great purchase. I will defiantly recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! THUMBS UP-
customer_reviews.text: super excited that this gift made it! tricked exactly what I ordered. excellent product👍👍
customer_reviews.author: MR. BONES

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This item was amazing and would recommend this to everyone I know.. The service was fast and as predicted. Very sharp and utilized as the upgraded appliances needed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lee

customer_reviews.title: And we love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mother in law, and then she didn’t end up coming to Christmas... so we kept them! And we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: This knife set is excellent for everyday kitchen food preparation use
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is excellent for everyday kitchen food preparation use. They sharpen each time you pull out and put away. Neat idea. My wife is the chef in the family and prepares meals for the week and does alot of cutting of various kinds of ingredients and the various knife type selection is a big help. They are organized in the holder and you know where to find them on the counter vs in a drawer mixed together. She would probably not spend the money for herself, but she is very pleased with them and they have made her cooking experience even more enjoyable. Jeff, NY
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Seeley

customer_reviews.title: The knives, they will cut, slice, and ...
customer_reviews.text: The knives, they will cut, slice, and dice. So far they are continuing to slice well after a month's worth of cooking, the sharpening slots seem to be functioning as stated. Will update further after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: PiyoPiyo

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: These knives arrived damaged and rusted on handle. They were cheaply made. In the photo you can see that there is a gap between the black and silver parts of the knife handle. There was brownish rust inside part of that gap and coming out on the silver part. I wiped that off before I took picture. If the brown stuff is “supposed” to be there, just no. Bad quality. Im not paying $80 for crappy knives. I returned them. Ps. I read the reviews that these rust but I bought them anyway because I hand wash my dishes and they don’t stay wet long. I didn’t even get to try these bc they came rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a retired chef. I bought this knife set for my home. Almost a year later I noticed that I have two cracks in the chef’s knife and a crack in the handle of the pairing knife. Starting to get rust spots on few of the steak knives. I have over 35 year old chefs knives that l still use, and keep their edge better. Non have cracks in the blades. Surprisingly one of them is from the same manufacturer and still great.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: works and holds up very well still using in the kitchen just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Rusting.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad knives but I was given them as a gift and was not aware they were not dish washer safe. They are rusty and useless. Now I have to purchase a new knife set. Wouldn't buy for anyone. Not to mention the most used knives(the steak knives) are NOT self sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: depetre

customer_reviews.title: I love the blade sharpeners in the block.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and very easy to clean. Well balanced and I love the blade sharpeners in the storage block.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A really good set of knifes at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These knives are worlds better than my old cutlery. Arrived super fasg. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, got this product sent to me in Australia, used it for 2 weeks and all knives were blunt. Steak knives not serrated or sharp, wont cut anything. Don't buy these, they don't self sharpen, shouldn't need to sharpen within 2 weeks, went not even all knives were used. Rubbish I better get my money back and shipping cost to return. Will keep you all posted
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Good product. These knives are really pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good product. These knives are really pretty and sturdy. I would have given it a rating of five stars, however, I thought the knives would be a bit sharper. I do like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice product, love that the knives are always sharp.
customer_reviews.author: John J Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Quick to Rust
customer_reviews.text: very sharp, work great- however haven't had them that long ( approx. 2 mo) and despite drying thoroughly - they are beginning to rust when placed in the self sharpening portion of the block
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The best knife set I've ever used, the blades are sharp and versatile. I love the built in sharpener, though I wish the steak knives had one as well (sharpeners are just for the top row). They clean easily have so far have not blemishes in any way. I make sure to handwash as the instructions say, but wish you could just throw them in the dishwasher. A bit pricey, but definitely a quality purchase and cheaper than comparable sets.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality. Prone to instant rust.
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty knives with good great holder. However they are extremely prone to rust. If you leave a spot of water on the knife overnight you get a rust spot the next morning. This is unfortunate because they are fun to use and gorgeous. I especially like the built-in sharpener. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Patterson

customer_reviews.title: 1 Week Old and Found a Rust Spot Already
customer_reviews.text: Although I have been meticulous when it comes to washing and drying the knives, I found a small rust spot on one of the steak knives already. I can't imagine we will get much use out of this set...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Not quality, not worth the money. 😞
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set of knives for my husband for Father’s Day! At first I loved them, then tonight cutting up chicken to cook, somehow the largest knife of the set cracked and a shard came off. So disappointing at the price I paid!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Thompson Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product great buy, my husband is a chef and was very happy with the quality they have turnt out to be. Only thing we dont like is it doesnt have scissors
customer_reviews.author: AutismMom

customer_reviews.title: Not all are self sharpening
customer_reviews.text: I really love the knives but they can NEVER be run through the dishwasher otherwise they will wear faster over time. They are amazing though and I love the self sharpening. I wish it was self sharpening for all knives and not just the top section. This was failed to be mentioned, and what’s funny is that the steak knives are the ones that we use the most.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Melchior

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my dad, and he loves how heavy the knives feel in his hand and how well they cut through whatever he is cooking! The self-sharpening holder is a nice touch as well!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: First off the chef knife broke on the first use. The tip snapped off. Then after one was rust started spotting on the blades surface.

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was agreat gift foe myself and my son in law. After a few washes in the dishwasher, we have some discoloring and small specs of rust. Great sharpening block but not the best material for the knives although the Knife designs are pretty cool and comfortable. I enjoy using this set

customer_reviews.title: First new knife set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a birthday present. It is easy to use. Very sharp knives and it looks good on my counter top. Never had new knives before and I would recommend these for gifting. Very good easy to hold and control handles.

customer_reviews.title: They are a good
customer_reviews.text: You can pay as much for a set of knives as you want. These knives are a value for the price. They come sharp and sharpen themselves each time you take them in and out of the block. They are a good value

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage, steak knives are dull
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage, steak knives are dull, the handles are a lose fitting plastic, and the chef knife has micro chips on the blade. The “unique” block design that holds the knives looks as it was spray painted as it is dull in color and dirty. Such a disappointment as I was eagerly awaiting the arrival of these knives as they got such good reviews. I don’t understand actually how these knives reviewed so well, I’m guessing either employees of the company wrote the reviews or the people that left the good reviews have never owned an actual quality set of knives before. Returning mine ASAP
customer_reviews.author: David Della Paolera

customer_reviews.title: Really well designed knives
customer_reviews.text: I just chopped some cabbage then pork that a few pieces were grisly. Knives were awesome cutting through the meat no effort and chopping the cabbage to perfection. They are solid well weighted with a nice grip. Blades are thin. Wouldn't want to try to pry anything with them. But if you want knives that cut well and bonus NO SHARPENING!, I would highly recommend these. And the look nice on the counter

customer_reviews.title: Blades too thin at cutting edge.
customer_reviews.text: The metal is milled too thin beyond the backbone of the blade. This creates a dangerous situation with a blade which is prone to chipping and breakage. If the milling angle was not so steep from backbone to cutting blade, this would be a much safer and durably dependable product.
customer_reviews.author: _Good luck

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Great knives that are sharp each time you use them
customer_reviews.text: I love my new knives! I was so sick of complaining about my old dull ones that I decided to splurge and buy a nice set that self-sharpens. The only downside is that to stay nice they need to be washed and dried right away and not left in the sink to clean later. So far I'm being very diligent in caring for them properly.

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with my order and the knives seem to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my order and the knives seem to be great. I haven't used them enough to know if they really do stay sharp but I do like the holder and it feels they are being sharpened when I pull them out. The knives themselves feel very strong but not heavy, which I like, they also look very nice on the counter. I received the package in a timely manner and they were packaged well. I purchased a gift for my mother that was very close to this but I paid over twice the price. Mom loved them enough that I wanted some for me so I ordered these. I am very pleased.

To name this set a PRO is straight misleading because no chef will give the blessing. better call it HOME series . yet the selling price is high for metal junk.

product_meta.title: Sabatier Self-Sharpening Edgekeeper Pro 12-Piece Forged Triple Rivet Knife Block Set, Black -
product_meta.description: Size:12-PieceSabatier EdgeKeeper Pro, Cutting Edge Design is Built-in. This 12-Piece Forged Triple Rivet Cutlery Set features built-in knife sharpeners that utilize patented EdgeKeeper design. This set includes an 8-inch chef knife, 8-inch slicer knife, 5-inch chef knife with kullens, 4.5-inch fine edge utility, 3.5-inch paring knife, and (6) 4.5-inch steak knives. Each slot features built-in knife sharpeners that automatically hone the cutlery every time the knives are removed or placed back in to the block. Each knife is made from high carbon stainless steel which is stain and corrosion resistant. The EdgeKeeper Pro Block is made from natural hardwood with a matte black finish and has five intergraded sharpening slots. Knives are not dishwasher safe; hand-wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately.
feature_bullets: SELF-SHARPENING KNIFE BLOCK: Each slot features a built in knife sharpener that automatically hones the cutlery every time the knives are removed or placed back in to the block (except steak knife slots)
RAZOR-SHARP BLADE EDGES: Each Blade is expertly hand crafted for maximum sharpness and edge retention to ensure precise slicing every time
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Each forged knife is made from high carbon stainless steel, making the blade stain and corrosion resistant.
ERGONOMIC CONTROL: Triple Riveted designed handles offer a sure grip and absolute stability that ensures comfort and maneuverability.

12 PIECE SET INCLUDES: 8 inch chef knife, 8 inch slicer knife, 5 inch chef knife with kullens, 4.5 inch fine edge utility, 3.5 inch paring knife, (6) 4.5 inch steak knives and an Edgekeeper Self-sharpening block
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: We stand behind our products! For best results, hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately. These knives are not suitable for the dishwasher.
